General.Name: Shenyang Blue Silver Ind Auto
General.Description: Shenyang Blue Silver Industry Automation Equipment Co., Ltd engages in the industrial cleaning and surface treatment, digital factory, rubber intelligent equipment, and electrical automation and integration business in China. The company offers customized and standard cleaning solutions, equipment and spare parts, maintenance and repair, upgrades, technical training, and other ancillary services. It also manufactures rubber equipment, tire building machines, heat laminators, and automatic tread assembly units, as well as provides radial tire production workshop and tire production control integrated system solutions. In addition, the company offers power distribution system used as high-voltage and low-voltage parts in power systems, system control, smart grid, and end-user use in the power system. Further, its logistics automation division provides logistics automation solutions in the fields of transportation, conveying, sorting, stacking, and three-dimensional warehouse, fast moving consumer goods, and parcel sorting applications, as well as control and management systems for tire manufacturing, and industrial robots. Additionally, the company is involved in general multi-piece cleaning business, dedicated single-piece cleaning business, and precision cleaning business. Shenyang Blue Silver Industry Automation Equipment Co., Ltd was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.
